Sentencas: Planar type solid oxide fuel cell stacks have been studied for use as commercial products because of their high energy density and environment-friendly operation.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels

Sentencas: They employ a gasket as a sealant as it enables easy assembly and repair.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels

Sentencas: However, its imperfect sealing property, detrimental to long-term operation, has limited its introduction.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels

Sentencas: Here, a stack design with a gasket sealant including a leakage gas induction channel is developed.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels

Sentencas: The leakage gas induction channel within the gasket sealant prevents gas leakage of fuel and air to the opposite electrode and ensures the stack's stable operation.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels

Sentencas: The stack design's reliability is confirmed via a heating-cycle test and an open circuit voltage to a 0.7 V voltage control test.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels

Sentencas: In-situ gas chromatography analysis shows that the diffusion of gases effectively reduces by releasing them outside the stack through the leakage gas induction channel.
Titulo: Enhanced reliability of planar-type solid oxide fuel cell stack incorporating leakage gas induction channels
